column1: #Text=Chou the Elder says : " Tell me who else was involved in the rebellion , and I might take mercy on you . "
#Text=Wan says : " I 'm not telling you anything . "
#Text=Chou the Elder says : " Then , you 've left me no choice .
#Text=And give back the fire you stole .
#Text=Great lion turtle , I am sorry for stealing the fire from you , and I accept my punishment .
#Text=But please , I need to be able to protect myself in the wilds .
#Text=" Lion turtle says : " Never again may you return to this city .
#Text=But I will allow you to keep the power of the element .
